name: Starbound (itch)
description:
Starbound was the second game project that me and my friends ever worked on.

We wanted to make a tower defense game so we just went on with the idea of a combination of space ships and towers where the action takes place on space platforms.

Me and my team won 3rd place on "Sesiunea Cercurilor Stiintifice Studentesti" from the Romanian-American University on 7 December 2016. The game was presented as a DEMO and now it is also available for everyone to download.
